name: webextension-email-address-plus
description: Browser extension that adds labels to email addresses for better organization
author: kud

scripts.publish:help: echo 'To publish: 1) Get API credentials from https://addons.mozilla.org/developers/addon/api/key/ 2) Run: web-ext sign --api-key=YOUR_KEY --api-secret=YOUR_SECRET --channel=listed'
scripts.version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const manifest=require('./manifest.json'); manifest.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '\n'); console.log('Updated manifest.json to version', pkg.version);" && git add manifest.json
